name: CYBERSECURED
description:
CYBERSECURED is a 2D-based educational / strategy game where the players are tasked to bolster their cybersecurity skills to protect them from various vulnerabilities, scammers, hackers, and other cyber threats. This game includes various scenarios that simulate real world cyber security problems, these will be incorporated with the use of different level designs and game mechanics.
